document.full_text: some euro zone governments are concerned highly indebted greece will not be able to refinance itself and may have to restructure its debt, the financial times deutschland reported on wednesday.
document.title: euro zone states consider greek restructuring: report
lines_and_colors: some euro zone governments are concerned highly indebted greece will not be able to refinance itself and may have to restructure its debt, the financial times deutschland reported on wednesday.
